description:
Their Offroad pants can handle the biggest expeditions, the biggest chores or be worn comfortably on a daily basis. Made of recycled polyester and cotton, they are reinforced in critical areas and have plenty of pockets to hold all your essentials. These are the ultimate multipurpose pants!

Reinforcements at the buttocks, ankles and knees, stretch fabric at the waist and behind the legs, everything is thought to allow a better durability in critical areas and a smoother flex in frequently used areas.

The multi-pocket design keeps all your essentials organized and close at hand. Adjustable at the waist and ankles, you'll feel like you're one with these pants!

Made of 65 % recycled polyester and 35 % cotton, they will be your best ally for your outdoor adventures as well as your everyday life!
name: Hooke Offroad Pants - Mens
